useful_title: Economics of Work and Family  Junior Seminar
best_gem_comment: A fantastic junior seminar. This class will make you appreciate economics as a discipline so much more. Also, Claudia is a gem of a professor; if you’re an Econ student, don’t miss the opportunity to take a class with her.
best_gem_comment_short: Also, Claudia is a gem of a professor; if you’re an Econ student, don’t miss the opportunity to take a class with her.

useful_title: A Libertarian Perspective on Economic and Social Policy
best_gem_comment: Definitely take this class! Probably the easiest Ec elective you are going to find and made getting a secondary in Ec super easy. Not as much of a gem as I was expecting but if you make sure you know the empirical evidence from the readings as well as section and lecture material going into the exams you will do great!
best_gem_comment_short: Not as much of a gem as I was expecting but if you make sure you know the empirical evidence from the readings as well as section and lecture material going into the exams you will do great!

best_gem_comment: This is a great class!! Not difficult but very rewarding. You learn about lots of interesting economic and policy–oriented topics that are extremely relevant to today's world, and both professors are extremely experienced/knowledgable. Lectures are interesting and debates between the two professors especially are a gem. Exams are not difficult at all if you follow along section material and do the practice exams beforehand. The policy memo is also a great learning experience. One thing I would say is not ideal is that TFs can be hard to reach and don't host office hours often.
best_gem_comment_short: Lectures are interesting and debates between the two professors especially are a gem.

useful_title: Personal Finance Making Better Decisions and Building a Better Financial System
best_gem_comment: this class is super good in providing knowledge that is very practical and applicable to real–life. it is not necessarily easy or a gem though, sometimes the p sets are frustratingly poorly worded/ difficult/ nit picky but overall if you try you can get a good grade and learn some really practical info.
best_gem_comment_short: it is not necessarily easy or a gem though, sometimes the p sets are frustratingly poorly worded/ difficult/ nit picky but overall if you try you can get a good grade and learn some really practical info.
